item.title: CVE-2023-6671|2024-08-02T08:35:14.828Z -- open%20journal%20systems -- open%20journal%20systems
item.description: A vulnerability has been discovered on OJS, that consists in a CSRF (Cross-Site Request Forgery) attack that forces an end user to execute unwanted actions on a web application in which they're currently authenticated.
